tests.title: UPSC CDS 01/2026: CT 01: Synonyms
tests.description: Words with similar meanings used to improve vocabulary and comprehension.

tests.title: CT 02: Antonyms
tests.description: Words with opposite meanings asked in direct vocabulary questions.

tests.title: CT 03: Spellings
tests.description: Identification of correct and incorrect spellings including commonly confused spellings.

tests.title: CT 04: Fill in the Blanks (Vocab)
tests.description: Context-based word selection to complete sentences meaningfully.

tests.title: CT 05: Paired Words (Homophones)
tests.description: Words that sound the same but differ in meaning and spelling.

tests.title: CT 06: Borrowed Words
tests.description: Words borrowed from foreign languages with modern English usage.

tests.title: CT 07: Match the Words
tests.description: Matching given words with correct meanings, synonyms, or definitions.

tests.title: CT 08: One Word Substitution
tests.description: Replacing descriptive phrases with a single precise word.

tests.title: CT 09: Phrase or Idiom Meaning - 01
tests.description: Meaning and application of commonly used idioms and phrases.

tests.title: CT 10: Phrase or Idiom Meaning - 02
tests.description: Additional idiom/phrase meaning and contextual usage.

tests.title: CT 11: Commonly Used Words
tests.description: Frequently used vocabulary words found in daily and exam contexts.

tests.title: CT 12: Confusing Words
tests.description: Words that appear similar but differ in meaning or usage.

tests.title: CT 13: Usage of Words
tests.description: Choosing correct word usage based on sentence meaning and grammar.

tests.title: CT 14: Parts of Speech
tests.description: Identification and usage of noun, verb, adjective, adverb, preposition, conjunction etc.

tests.title: CT 15: Phrase Replacement
tests.description: Replacing incorrect or awkward phrases with grammatically correct ones.

tests.title: CT 16: Correlating Sentence
tests.description: Matching sentence halves or related statements logically.

tests.title: CT 17: Fill in the Blanks (Grammar)
tests.description: Grammar-based blanks including tenses, articles, prepositions, modals.

tests.title: CT 18: Error Spotting - 01
tests.description: Identifying errors in grammar, subject-verb, tense, articles and structure.

tests.title: CT 19: Error Spotting - 02
tests.description: Additional error identification with similar grammar patterns.

tests.title: CT 20: Active and Passive Voice
tests.description: Converting sentences from active to passive and vice versa.

tests.title: CT 21: Direct and Indirect Speech
tests.description: Changing narration between direct and indirect speech.

tests.title: CT 22: Para Jumbles - 01
tests.description: Arranging shuffled sentences to form a meaningful paragraph.

tests.title: CT 23: Para Jumbles - 02
tests.description: Additional paragraph reordering practice.

tests.title: CT 24: Sentence Jumbles - 01
tests.description: Rearranging parts of a single sentence to make correct structure.

tests.title: CT 25: Sentence Jumbles - 02
tests.description: Additional mixed-sentence arrangement questions.

tests.title: CT 26: Sentence Completion
tests.description: Completing sentences meaningfully using correct grammar and logic.

tests.title: CT 01: Number System - 01
tests.description: Natural numbers, integers, rational numbers, LCM, HCF, basic operations.

tests.title: CT 02: Number System - 02
tests.description: Divisibility rules, remainders, fractions, recurring decimals, basic number theory.

tests.title: CT 03: Simplification
tests.description: BODMAS-based simplification using fractions, decimals, roots and powers.

tests.title: CT 04: Average
tests.description: Simple and weighted averages, combined averages and application-based problems.

tests.title: CT 05: Percentage
tests.description: Basic percentage conversions, increase/decrease, comparison and applications.

tests.title: CT 06: Ratio and Proportion
tests.description: Ratios, proportions, direct and inverse variation, practical applications.

tests.title: CT 07: Mixture Problems
tests.description: Mixture and allegation method, ratio-based liquid/solid mixture problems.

tests.title: CT 08: Profit and Loss
tests.description: CP, SP, MP, discount, marked price, successive profit/loss, overall gain.

tests.title: CT 09: Interest
tests.description: Simple and compound interest, rate-time principal relation, CI for multiple periods.

tests.title: CT 10: Speed Time and Distance
tests.description: Relative speed, trains, boats-stream problems, uniform and variable speed concepts.

tests.title: CT 11: Time and Work
tests.description: Efficiency method, work-time relation, pipes & cisterns, combined work.

tests.title: CT 12: Set theory
tests.description: Sets, subsets, union, intersection, complement, Venn diagrams and simple problems.

tests.title: CT 13: Logarithmic Functions
tests.description: Log laws, base change, exponential-log relation, evaluation of log expressions.

tests.title: CT 14: Sequences and Series
tests.description: Arithmetic progression, geometric progression, nth term, sum of series.

tests.title: CT 15: Algebra: Identities
tests.description: Standard algebraic identities like (a+b)², a²-b², expansion and factorization.

tests.title: CT 16: Algebra: Quadratic Equations
tests.description: Quadratic equation forms, roots, discriminant, factorization, sum/product of roots.

tests.title: CT 17: Algebra: Miscellaneous
tests.description: Linear equations, algebraic manipulation, inequalities and expressions.

tests.title: CT 18: Trigonometric Ratios and Identities
tests.description: sin, cos, tan ratios, basic identities, complementary angles, simple applications.

tests.title: CT 19: Heights and Distances
tests.description: Angle of elevation and depression, trigonometric application in right triangles.

tests.title: CT 20: Trigonometry
tests.description: Basic trigonometric formulas, values of standard angles, simple problem solving.

tests.title: CT 21: Geometry - 01
tests.description: Lines, angles, triangles, congruence, similarity, properties of geometric shapes.

tests.title: CT 22: Geometry - 02
tests.description: Circles, chords, tangents, polygons, internal/external angles, basic constructions.

tests.title: CT 23: Mensuration (Plane Figure)
tests.description: Area & perimeter of 2D shapes—triangle, rectangle, circle, trapezium.

tests.title: CT 24: Mensuration (Solid Figure)
tests.description: Volume & surface area of cube, cuboid, cylinder, cone, sphere.

tests.title: CT 25: Data Sufficiency
tests.description: Determine sufficiency of given information to answer quantitative questions.

tests.title: CT 26: Data Interpretation
tests.description: Tables, graphs, bar charts, pie charts, percentage-based interpretation.
